q21_ai_familiarity.text: How often do you use AI-based assistants or chatbots (such as Siri, Alexa, Google Assistant, ChatGPT)?

q22_ai_self_efficacy.text: “I consider myself knowledgeable about how AI like ChatGPT works.”

q23_ai_knowledge_hallucination.text: Large Language Model AIs (like ChatGPT) can sometimes produce incorrect or made-up information that looks convincing.

q24_ai_knowledge_realtime.text: Chatbot assistants like ChatGPT have access to real-time, up-to-date information on the internet.

q25_propensity_trust_default.text: “I tend to trust technology or automation by default, until I see evidence that something is wrong.”

q26_propensity_trust_skeptical.text: “When it comes to new automated systems, I am generally skeptical of them at first.”
